Using the ignited flames from his [[jinchūriki]] transformation, Obito shapes them into hands to attack with.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto: Shinobi Collection Shippū Ranbu]]''.
* This technique has had inconsistent colouring in various official colour pages. In the official ''Shōnen Jump'' full colour chapter 638, the chakra arms are given the same colouring for Kurama's [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]], while in a later subsequent chapter they are shown as a transparent red.
